Identification of adversary-owned or con.Action: Compare destination IPs from Zeek conn.log against lists of suspicious IPs identified by external internet scanning efforts or threat intelligence feeds associated with adversary infrastructure development. Use correlation analysis to find connections between internal hosts and suspected adversary infrastructure IPs.

Analyze Zeek conn.log and ssl.log for connections to external IPs. Look for external IPs identified by threat intelligence as exhibiting patterns (services, certificates) associated with known adversary C2 frameworks. Use filtering and correlation to identify internal hosts communicating with these IPs.
